title: Ola Electric makes strategic investment in fast-charging tech company StoreDot - Economic Times
content: Ola Electric makes strategic investment in fast-charging tech company StoreDot  Economic Times
description: As part of the investment, Ola Electric will have access to the companys battery technology, which it claims can fully charge a battery in five minutes. Ola will also have exclusive rights to manufacture batteries with StoreDots fast charge technology in India.
